resources.string: Please capture the front face of the check
Please capture the back of the check
Please capture the back of the document
Please capture the front face of the document
Would you like to capture another page?
The Check account details are invalid. Please retake the photo while the Check is aligned correctly within the frame
We still having difficulties reading the Check, Do you agree to send the Check as captured?
We couldn\'t read the account details from the check. Please retake the photo while the check is aligned correctly within the frame.
We couldn\'t read the image details. Please make sure there is enough light
Document boundaries detected are not in an acceptable size, please capture the document again
There was an error while processing the image, please capture the image again
We couldn\'t process the image as captured. Please try capturing the documnet again
The image created is not in a valid size, please try taking the picture again in a place with less light
There was an error while validating the picture taken, please try taking the picture again
The image detected as blurry, please try taking the picture again
We detected that one of the corner may be folded. please make sure the check is lying flat on the surface
We detected that one of the edges is torn or missing. please make sure the check is complete
The picture captured is over skewed. Please try to capture again while the angles are straight within the frame
The picture captured is too dark, please try taking the picture in a place with more light
There is too much noise on the picture as taken, please try taking the picture in a place with more light
The image created is not in valid dimensions, please try taking the picture again
We detected invalid horizontal lines on the image, please make sure the check is valid and there is no bright light at specific location on the check
We detected carbon strip on the image, please make sure the check is valid and there is no bright light at specific location on the check
We detected check on top of other check, please make sure the check is valid and try again
The image created is not in a valid size, please try taking the picture again in a place with less light
We suspect that the MICR line is interrupted with signeture or something else.
We couldn\'t read the details from the image.
We have detected the front face of the check being captured instead of the back. Please turn the check to its other side
failed to open camera - check camera is not open by other application
Poor lighting, turn on the flash
Position the image here and we\'ll capture the information
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.

Having problems?
 - Make sure the check and background are in contrast.
 - Make sure that you have enough light to capture.
 - Place the device flat over the check.
